alluxio.master.file

Class FileSystemMasterClientRestServiceHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • alluxio.master.file.FileSystemMasterClientRestServiceHandler

  • @NotThreadSafe
 @Path(value="master/file")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public final class FileSystemMasterClientRestServiceHandler
extends Object
    This class is a REST handler for file system master requests.

      • createDirectory

        @POST
 @Path(value="create_directory")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createDirectory(@QueryParam(value="path")
                                                                                        String path,
                                                                                        @QueryParam(value="persisted")
                                                                                        Boolean persisted,
                                                                                        @QueryParam(value="recursive")
                                                                                        Boolean recursive,
                                                                                        @QueryParam(value="allowExists")
                                                                                        Boolean allowExists)
        Parameters:
        path - the file path
        persisted - whether directory should be persisted
        recursive - whether parent directories should be created if they do not already exist
        allowExists - whether the operation should succeed even if the directory already exists
        Returns:
        the response object

      • createFile

        @POST
 @Path(value="create_file")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createFile(@QueryParam(value="path")
                                                                              String path,
                                                                              @QueryParam(value="persisted")
                                                                              Boolean persisted,
                                                                              @QueryParam(value="recursive")
                                                                              Boolean recursive,
                                                                              @QueryParam(value="blockSizeBytes")
                                                                              Long blockSizeBytes,
                                                                              @QueryParam(value="ttl")
                                                                              Long ttl)
        Parameters:
        path - the file path
        persisted - whether directory should be persisted
        recursive - whether parent directories should be created if they do not already exist
        blockSizeBytes - the target block size in bytes
        ttl - the time-to-live (in milliseconds)
        Returns:
        the response object

                                                                             boolean loadDirectChildren,
                                                                             @DefaultValue(value="") @QueryParam(value="loadMetadataType")

        Parameters:
        path - the file path
        loadDirectChildren - whether to load direct children of path

 @Path(value="mount")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response mount(@QueryParam(value="path")

                                                                   @QueryParam(value="readOnly")
                                                                   Boolean readOnly,
                                                                   @QueryParam(value="shared")
                                                                   Boolean shared)
        Parameters:
        path - the alluxio mount point
        ufsPath - the UFS path to mount
        readOnly - whether to make the mount option read only
        shared - whether to make the mount option shared with all Alluxio users

        the response object

      • setAttribute

        @POST
 @Path(value="set_attribute")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response setAttribute(@QueryParam(value="path")
                                                                                  String path,
                                                                                  @QueryParam(value="pinned")
                                                                                  Boolean pinned,
                                                                                  @QueryParam(value="ttl")
                                                                                  Long ttl,
                                                                                  @QueryParam(value="persisted")
                                                                                  Boolean persisted,
                                                                                  @QueryParam(value="owner")
                                                                                  String owner,
                                                                                  @QueryParam(value="group")
                                                                                  String group,
                                                                                  @QueryParam(value="permission")
                                                                                  Short permission,
                                                                                  @QueryParam(value="recursive")
                                                                                  Boolean recursive)
        Parameters:
        path - the file path
        pinned - the pinned flag value to use
        ttl - the time-to-live (in seconds) to use
        persisted - the persisted flag value to use
        owner - the file owner
        group - the file group
        permission - the file permission bits
        recursive - whether the attribute should be set recursively
        Returns:
        the response object
